survey.introduction: Hello, I'm from Communicus, a consumer organization conducting a survey and would like to include you.

questions.question: Do you smoke filter, non-menthol cigarettes?
How many cigarettes do you usually smoke per day?
Which of the following statements apply to you?
options: I eat dinner in a restaurant at least once a month.
I do most of the food shopping for myself and/or my family.
I have taken an airline trip on a scheduled commercial airline in the past 12 months.

questions.question: Into which of the following age groups do you fall?
